TopicTitle: Trying to understand the Memory Crash

Articles.Content:
I did something really dumb yesterday; I was tired of KSP crashing thinking a mod was causing it. I went ahead and deleted my local & separate from steam copy of KSP 25.0. Knowing that HelldiverÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Mini Space Shuttle has some memory issues I reinstalled both Active Texture Management and Texture Replacer for 25.0. I still get a no memory error IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m wondering if there anything I can do. I understand that IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m using the 32 bit version of KSP and it only limited to I think 8 GBs and Windows uses about 3 of the 8 GBs. What I donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t get is why would, it work before with good 15 mods and after the reinstall with just the Active Texture Management and Texture Replacer & the installer version of the Mini Shuttle all for KSP 25.0.

The errorÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

It sounds like that mod is drawing to much memory and pushing over the 3.4GB of RAM limit that 32bit has. Try forcing the game to run in OpenGL and see if that brings the memory foot print down a bit. But honestly I think it is that mod that is the issue.
